video_title: How to Stay Positive During Your Worst Days #shorts
transcript:
everything's going wrong my friendships
aren't what they used to be work is
taking a toll on me time is a construct
and I feel like I'm in a pit of Eternal
suffering with no way to escape hang in
there I know it's hard right now your
mind is telling you things won't get
better everything's a mess everything's
never going to work out and everything
is futile I know it's hard to believe me
now but I'm here to remind you that it's
okay it's okay to be not okay and it's
okay to hurt because one day things will
get better I
take a deep breath now exhale think of
something that made you happy today even
if it's just the smallest thing like you
saw a funny looking dog in the park the
other day then the more positive things
will be revealed to you not only that
just by watching this video you're with
the community that cares about you and
knows what you're going through we're
here for you so remember when you feel
that things are getting bad again
there's always somebody to reach out to
and when you start to think
